Text:
The Audio is the Directors Commentary! Not the Movie Soundtrack!

Unless you have the time, tools and ability to rip and replace the audio files (which are included), don't wast your time downloading this. Especially when it took me 3 days!

I definitely won't be seeding this file.

Multiple audio tracks in one .avi file!!!

3 audiotracks (streams): 
1. English (AC3 5.1), 
2. Estonian dub (AC3 5.1) 
3. English commentary (AC3 2.0)
